name: Directive("Destroy");
description:
Team up in groups of 3-5 to try and save the station before a terrifying robot kills you all. Play as either a Minnow (hunted) or a Barracuda (hunter) in this asynchronous multiplayer game.

To play the game, first download both the .exe and the .pck. Designate one player as a host. The host should then open the Command Prompt and enter "ipconfig". The hosts IPv4 address should then be shared with the other players and input as an IP. All players must be on the same internet network.
